name: Techwars Global Conflict - KATO Prosperity Legacy
name_original: Techwars Global Conflict - KATO Prosperity Legacy
description:
TechWars Global Conflict is the world’s first isometric mecha PVP-Action with direct control.

This Bundle will give you exclusive premium skins of KATO corp.

This Bundle includes:

- Flatout Prosperity Legacy premium skin - Tetra Prosperity Legacy premium skin - Wyvern Prosperity Legacy premium skin - Gladiator Prosperity Legacy premium skin - Techwars Global Conflict - The Game
